comment.body: Why don't u put GPS coordinates with shot date?

> [kai0](#comment_1_1EZTWytasXcKdiUFnN4KHqAfvg1nwkTkKv): 这些图片是我花了好几年从网上收集来的，那时这技术还不普及。

You may put the note of the address or the area title for each photo. 

Information without supporting data lacks of credibility. That is, useless.

> [kai0](#comment_1_1EZTWytasXcKdiUFnN4KHqAfvg1nwkTkKv): 

If you don't know the location and the date of the photos, at least you need to specify the source URL u got them from.

> [kai0](#comment_2_1EZTWytasXcKdiUFnN4KHqAfvg1nwkTkKv): 这些图片并不具有中共特色的“典型”，而是具有普遍性，在中国，到处都是这样，数量之多无法统计。反而是那些高楼大厦，只具有“典型”的意义，没有普遍性。

I know what you mean, but without the essential information for each photo, your effort will become meaningless.

There're 6 何 原則 in the news. Who, When, Where, How, What, Why. 

你越忽略6何之间的项目，你的文章就变得不那么有价值了。
Isn't that a nuclear power plant??
